item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, May 8, 2025 at 6:25 PM UTC
item.description:

2. Chicago native Cardinal Prevost elected pope, takes name Leo XIV (132 points | 48 comments)
3. Reservoir Sampling (65 points | 11 comments)

11. Ask HN: What are good high-information density UIs (screenshots, apps, sites)? (248 points | 195 comments)

25. Brokk: AI for Large Codebases (16 points | 2 comments)

27. Imagineers defend new Walt Disney robot (38 points | 27 comments)

29. Microservices are a tax your startup probably can't afford (212 points | 187 comments)
